definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Nuclear reactors are net positive in terms of supporting the grid.
sentences.chinese: 在支持输电网方面，核反应堆是正极。

sentences.english: Instead they use materials with lattice structures for both positive and negative electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 取而代之的是在正极和负极上使用栅格结构材料。

sentences.english: It will be drawn to the positive electrode.
sentences.chinese: 负电子将会被带到正极上去。

sentences.english: Olivine-type LiFePO4 cathode material was successfully synthesized by co-precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 采用共沉淀法合成了橄榄石型磷酸亚铁锂正极材料。

sentences.english: The invention further discloses a preparation method for the positive material polysulfide carbyne of the battery.
sentences.chinese: 还公开了一种电池正极材料多硫化碳炔的制备方法。

sentences.english: The transition-metal sulphides are widely used as cathode in thermal batteries, especially iron disulphide and cobalt disulphide.
sentences.chinese: 过渡族金属硫化物是一类很好的热电池正极材料。

sentences.english: It was believed that lithium manganese oxide was a good substitute.
sentences.chinese: 锂锰氧化物是最有希望的正极活性物质。

sentences.english: The positive leader is very dim and highly branched at first.
sentences.chinese: 正极先导起初非常暗淡，分叉很多。

definition: abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
grid (in vacuum tubes)/gate (terminal of a field-effect transistor)
